item.title: Kamilah add a quote by Robin Hobb
item.description: "Don’t do what you can’t undo, until you’ve considered what you can’t do once you’ve done it." -- Robin Hobb

item.title: Kamilah add a quote by Joe Abercrombie
item.description: "All an arsehole knows about is shit. ~ Dogman" -- Joe Abercrombie

item.title: Kamilah add a quote by Robin Hobb
item.description: "When considering a man's motives, remember you must not measure his wheat with your bushel. He may not be using the same standard at all." -- Robin Hobb

item.title: Kamilah add a quote by Jennifer Fallon
item.description: "It was almost as if he enjoyed the fact that the more agitated his opponent was, the more serene he became. Belagren's thoughts about Antonov in The Lion of Senet" -- Jennifer Fallon

item.title: Kamilah add a quote by Joe Abercrombie
item.description: "Once you've got a task to do, it's better to do it than live with the fear of it." -- Joe Abercrombie

item.title: Kamilah add a quote by Joe Abercrombie
item.description: "One should learn the lessons of history. The mistakes of the past need only be made once. Unless there are no other choices. ~ Bayaz" -- Joe Abercrombie

item.title: Kamilah add a quote by Joe Abercrombie
item.description: "A man who does't want opinions should keep his own mouth shut. ~ Quai apprentice to Bayaz" -- Joe Abercrombie

item.title: Kamilah add a quote by Terry Goodkind
item.description: "People are stupid. They will believe a lie because they want to believe it's true, or because they are afraid it might be true." -- Terry Goodkind

item.title: Kamilah add a quote by Terry Goodkind
item.description: "many people must be ruled to thrive. In their selfishness and greed, they see free people as their oppressors. They wish to have a leader who will cut the taller plants so the sun will reach them. They think no plant should be allowed to grow taller than the shortest, and in that way give light to all. They would rather be provided a guiding light, regardless of the fuel, than light a candle themselves." -- Terry Goodkind

item.title: Kamilah add a quote by Terry Goodkind
item.description: "The cannon of the spirits says that intent is guilt. Failure to successfully carryout the intent does not absolve the guilt. ~ Cara Mordsith" -- Terry Goodkind

item.title: Kamilah add a quote by Terry Goodkind
item.description: "When you insist someone submit to your will, it is accomplished most easily if you give them a small victory so they can retain their dignity while they do as you insist. ~ Kahlan Mother Confessor" -- Terry Goodkind

item.title: Kamilah add a quote by Gregory Maguire
item.description: "People who claim that they're evil are usually no worse than the rest of us... It's people who claim that they're good, or any way better than the rest of us, that you have to be wary of." -- Gregory Maguire

item.title: Kamilah add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies, said Jojen. The man who never reads lives only one." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Kamilah add a quote by John Waters
item.description: "We need to make books cool again. If you go home with somebody and they don't have books, don't fuck them." -- John Waters

item.title: Kamilah add a quote by Jonathan Stroud
Kamilah add a quote by John Green
item.description: "What a slut time is. She screws everybody." -- John Green

item.title: Kamilah add a quote by Ludwig Wittgenstein
item.description: "A serious and good philosophical work could be written consisting entirely of jokes." -- Ludwig Wittgenstein
